summary: Theme-related updates are present: global CSS tokens updated (light/dark), Tailwind theme extended with new shadows, and multiple pages/layout sections show modernized styling (gradients, shadows, typography). However, the diff also introduces multiple functional additions/behavior changes (e.g., Public Search, To‑Do navigation tab, Excel import/export and filtering enhancements) that were explicitly out of scope as “no new features/routing/auth changes.”

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed navigation and pages beyond styling: a new “To‑Do List” tab in the main layout navigation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is theme-only and explicitly states “Do not add new features” and “Do not change routing/authentication behavior.” Adding a new nav item/page access is functional scope expansion.

hallucinated_features.description: Login page includes a new “Public Search” flow/button and navigation to /search.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires styling updates only and explicitly forbids routing/authentication behavior changes. Adding a public search path/button is new functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard functional changes: “interactive revenue cards, task category filtering, expandable detail sections” and removal of due/completion date sortable sections (per summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 asks for visual modernization without changing app functionality; these are behavioral/feature changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Client page adds admin Excel template download and bulk import actions.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal is to avoid adding new features as part of the theme update.

hallucinated_features.description: Tasks page adds an integrated date filter, date-based search behavior, additional loading indicators, and export behavior changes respecting applied filters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; beyond styling and constitutes new/changed filtering/export functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Team page adds bulk import assignees and download template capabilities (admin actions).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; adds functional features beyond theme styling.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple components described as enhanced with new selection, bulk actions, inline editing, new dialog fields, etc. (ClientTable, TaskList, CreateTaskDialog, client dialogs).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is UI theme only and forbids new features/data-model/behavior changes; these are functional enhancements.

hallucinated_features.description: Hooks/query behavior changes described for public search (fail-fast retries, refetch behavior) in useQueries.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest forbids routing/auth changes and does not request backend/query behavior changes; also constraints mention not modifying certain immutable hook/bootstrap files (though this mentions useQueries specifically).
